info.name: Rural Health Management System API
info.description: Complete API collection for Rural Health Management System with all CRUD operations for Clinics, Patients, Staff, Visits, Diagnoses, and Prescriptions.

request.description: Check the health status of the API
Get paginated list of clinics with optional search and district filtering

response.name: Get All Clinics
response.body:
{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Central Rural Health Center",
            "address": "123 Main Street, Central Village",

            "district": "Central District",
            "created_at": "2025-06-28T09:37:07.43846Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-06-28T09:37:07.43846Z"
        }
    ],
    "page": 1,
    "per_page": 10,
    "total": 1,
    "total_pages": 1
}

query.description: Filter by role (Doctor, Nurse, Administrator, Pharmacist)

request.description: Delete a prescription (soft delete)
Step 1: Create a clinic first (required for patients and staff)
Step 2: Create a patient (use clinic_id from step 1)
Step 3: Create a staff member (use clinic_id from step 1)
Step 4: Create a visit (use IDs from previous steps)
Step 5: Create a diagnosis (use visit_id from step 4)
Step 6: Create a prescription (use visit_id from step 4)
